thread.title: James Hawes
thread.title_full: Optical Express | Laser Eye Surgery reviewed by James Hawes

author: James Hawes
title: James Hawes
text:
I recently had the laser eye surgery. I was very apprehensive about it and also rather scared. The staff at the reading clinic were absolutely amazing and I can't thank them enough. They gave me the best treatment that has changed my life. I would recommend to anyone!!
Patient CID: 62017872
